sentences.sContent: They gave him drugs to counteract his withdrawal symptoms.
sentences.sCn: 他们给他服药以消除他的脱瘾症状。

remMethod.val: counter (反) + act (动作) → 做相反的动作 → 抵消

words.tran: 反作用的；抵抗的；反对的
中和；反对的行动；抵抗；反动

trans.tranCn: 抵消， 中和； 阻碍
trans.tranOther: to reduce or prevent the bad effect of something, by doing something that has the opposite effect
